short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the raw beauty of Iceland with Custom Mountain Background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the raw beauty of Iceland with Custom Mountain Background. This extension offers a customizable wallpaper featuring the stunning Stakkholtsgja Canyon, a majestic natural wonder in Iceland. With its sheer cliffs and meandering stream running through the canyon, this scene provides an inspiring and awe-inspiring workspace. Each time you open a new tab, you'll be immersed in the rugged beauty of this canyon, creating a unique and relaxing environment for your screen.
